title: Dark Souls Graphic Novel Slipcase Box Set Is Nearly 50% Off At Amazon

Normally $50, the Dark Souls 1-3 Slipcase Set is on sale for only $28.49. Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Titan Comics' three-volume box set was published on October 29, but it's not the only budget-friendly collection containing these stories.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Titan Comics recently reissued the first three Dark Souls graphic novels in box set format, but you can already save nearly 50% on the three-volume paperback set at Amazon. Normally $50, the Dark Souls 1-3 Slipcase Set is on sale for only $28.49.

Dark Souls Graphic Novel Box Set (Volumes 1-3)

Box Set - $28.49 (was $50) | Omnibus - $25 (was $35)

The box set contains the first three graphic novels in the series--Dark Souls: Breath of Andolus, Dark Souls: Winters Spite, and Dark Souls: Legends of the Flame. In total, the three graphic novels clock in at 336 pages.

The Dark Souls graphic novel series features the aesthetic and some of the locales found in the popular From Software games, but this trio of books penned by George Mann and illustrated by Alan Quah are original tales with new characters and quests. Each paperback is filled with gorgeously grotesque art and come packaged in a new slipcase designed for this reissued collection.

Author George Mann has adapted multiple other major franchises into novels and comic books, including Star Wars, Doctor Who, Dragon Age, and Warhammer.

It's worth noting that these three graphic novels were previously compiled in Dark Souls: The Complete Collection, a 384-page paperback omnibus that also includes a prequel graphic novel titled The Age of Fire and the Tales of Ember short story anthology. The single-volume collection retails for $35, but is on sale for only $25 at Amazon.

Dark Souls Graphic Novels

The latest entry in the Dark Souls graphic novel series, The Willow King, released last August. You can find links to each individual volume below.

  • Dark Souls: The Complete Collection -- $25 ($35)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 1: The Breath of Andolus -- $14 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 1: The Breath of Andolus - Artist's Edition -- $29
  • Dark Souls Vol. 2: Winter's Spite -- $14 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 3: Legends of the Flame -- $17 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 4: The Age of Fire -- $22
  • Dark Souls Vol. 5: The Willow King -- $16 ($18)

Bloodborne Graphic Novels

Titan Comics also adapted From Software's Bloodborne into a graphic novel series. The sixth volume in the series, The Bleak Dominion, released last summer and is on sale for only $10 at Amazon. Similarly, you can pick up a budget-friendly box set that matches the style of the newer Dark Souls set.

  • Bloodborne Vol. 1-3 Box Set -- $29 ($50)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep -- $13.59 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 2: The Healing Thirst -- $15.62 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 3: A Song of Crows -- $15.85 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 4: The Veil Torn Asunder -- $16.43 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 5: Lady of the Lanterns -- $18
  • Bloodborne Vol. 6: The Bleak Dominion -- $10 ($18)

Elden Ring Manga

Meanwhile, From Software's latest hit, Elden Ring, has a comedy manga series that shows fans a different side of The Lands Between.

  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 1 (Paperback) -- $12 ($13) | Kindle - $7
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 2 (Paperback) -- $12 ($13) | Kindle - $7
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 3 (Paperback) -- $10 ($13) | Kindle - $7
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 4 (Paperback) -- $12 ($13) | Kindle - $7
